comment.author: 41755668@N00
comment._content:
Bravo!!!! Met Martha Sharp Joukowsky last night at a reception at Rockefeller University.  She is quite a woman. When she entered the field of Archeology there were very very few women doing so.
The glass ceiling is broken thanks to her.

comment.author: 66533516@N00
comment._content: Nice to see the people who make it possible. Cheers!
